sentence.text: ﻿Patient II.3, the sister of the index 32-year-old woman, had similar symptoms and social restrictions.
In her clinical examination, her height was 120 cm (−7.3 SD), head circumference was 54.5 cm (−1.6 SD), normal facial features, and normal psychomotor development.
Her skeletal deformities were almost similar to the index patient.
A skeletal survey revealed short limbs, radial bowing, and a very short femoral neck with an osteoporotic appearance, similar to the index patient.
In her hands and feet, short and broad metacarpal and metatarsal bones and brachydactyly were observed.
